mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_email, member_password, member_phone_number, memeber_name) values(#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberName})
mapper.select: select count(member_email) from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select count(member_phone_number) from tbl_member where member_phone_number = #{memberPhoneNumber}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_password = #{memberPassword}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_business (business_email, business_password, business_ceo_name, business_number, business_company_name, business_phone_number, business_establishment_date) values(#{businessEmail}, #{businessPassword}, #{businessCeoName}, #{businessNumber}, #{businessCompanyName}, #{businessPhoneNumber}, #{businessEstablishmentDate})
mapper.select: select count(business_email) from tbl_business where business_email = #{businessEmail}
select count(business_phone_number) from tbl_business where business_phone_number = #{businessPhoneNumber}
select count(business_number) from tbl_business where business_number = #{businessNumber}
select business_id from tbl_business where business_email = #{businessEmail} and business_password = #{businessPassword}
select member_email from tbl_member where member_phone_number = #{memberPhoneNumber}
select business_email from tbl_business where business_phone_number = #{businessPhoneNumber}
select member_id, member_email, member_password ,member_phone_number, member_name, member_img_original_name, member_img_uuid, member_img_path from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id}
select member_phone_number from tbl_member union select business_phone_number from tbl_business

select member_id, member_email, member_password, member_phone_number, member_name, member_register_date, member_status, member_img_original_name, member_img_uuid, member_img_path from tbl_member order by member_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{amount}

select m.member_id, count(distinct tbf.board_free_id) as boardCount , count(distinct tfr.reply_id ) as replyCount , member_email, member_password, member_phone_number, member_name, member_register_date, member_status, member_img_original_name, member_img_uuid, member_img_path from tbl_member m left join tbl_board_free tbf on m.member_id = tbf.member_id left join tbl_free_reply tfr on tbf.member_id = tfr.member_id where m.member_id = #{memberId} group by m.member_id
